item.title: [317]100% Mining base for your server![317]
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote="`ZeroScape, post:21, topic:349563"]Nice base!

You’d rather use

c.Send("You get some " + c.GetItemName(OreId).toLowerCase() + ".");

In RuneScape you get the message

You get some iron ore.

and not

You get some Iron ore.

That look stupid :P[/quote]
i know, i have that in my source, i just didnt tell people how to do it

Read full topic

Nice base!

You’d rather use

c.Send("You get some " + c.GetItemName(OreId).toLowerCase() + ".");

In RuneScape you get the message

You get some iron ore.

and not

You get some Iron ore.

That look stupid

item.title: [317]100% Mining base for your server![317]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“WaleedScape, post:19, topic:349563”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=445937.msg3280581#msg3280581 date=1279841640]
Cross off the list if you have this functioning with mining.

[ul][li]Checking if you have the correct pickaxe for your current level.[/li]
[li]Checking if you contain a pickaxe in your pack or the player is wielding it[/li]
[li]Checking if you have the required level to mine the rock.[/li]
[li]Prospecting a rock a bit buggy though.[/li]
[li]Rock contains only 1 ore.[/li]
[li]Rock has a chance of giving a random f2p gem.[/li]
[li]Rock has a percentage of success (ability to mine quicker) depending on mining level.[/li]
[li]Mining action repeats until a desired timeout, thus defines a “not successful” attempt to mine the rock[/li]
[li]If mining timeout becomes unstable and is not put into play, a log-out timeout is then put into play.[/li]
[li]Rock has a chance of emitting gas, thus a spark would cause the rock to explode, causing harm to the miner and breaking his pickaxe.[/li]
[li]A spiritual rock golem can appear in any rock. not yet, itd about 30%[/li]
[li]Rocks turn into “stumps” before returning the ore.[/li]
[list][li]The higher the level the rock, the longer it takes to restore.[/li]
[li]Player stop mining upon gaining a full pack of ore.[/li]
[li]Player can no longer mine after gaining a full pack of ore.[/li]
[/list]
[/quote][/quote]

Then it’s not 100% :P[/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: [317]100% Mining base for your server![317]
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:18, topic:349563”]Cross off the list if you have this functioning with mining.

[list]
[li]Checking if you have the correct pickaxe for your current level.[/li]
[li]Checking if you contain a pickaxe in your pack or the player is wielding it[/li]
[li]Checking if you have the required level to mine the rock.[/li]
[li]Prospecting a rock a bit buggy though.[/li]
[li]Rock contains only 1 ore.[/li]
[li]Rock has a chance of giving a random f2p gem.[/li]
[li]Rock has a percentage of success (ability to mine quicker) depending on mining level.[/li]
[li]Mining action repeats until a desired timeout, thus defines a “not successful” attempt to mine the rock[/li]
[li]If mining timeout becomes unstable and is not put into play, a log-out timeout is then put into play.[/li]
[li]Rock has a chance of emitting gas, thus a spark would cause the rock to explode, causing harm to the miner and breaking his pickaxe.[/li]
[li]A spiritual rock golem can appear in any rock. not yet, itd about 30%[/li]
[li]Rocks turn into “stumps” before returning the ore.[/li]

[ul][li]The higher the level the rock, the longer it takes to restore.[/li]
[li]Player stop mining upon gaining a full pack of ore.[/li]
[li]Player can no longer mine after gaining a full pack of ore.[/li][/ul][/quote]

item.title: [317]100% Mining base for your server![317]

[ul][li]Checking if you have the correct pickaxe for your current level.[/li]

[li]Mining action repeats until a desired timeout, thus defines a “not successful” attempt to mine the rock[/li]
[li]If mining timeout becomes unstable and is not put into play, a log-out timeout is then put into play.[/li]
[li]Rock has a chance of emitting gas, thus a spark would cause the rock to explode, causing harm to the miner and breaking his pickaxe.[/li]
[li]A spiritual rock golem can appear in any rock.[/li]
[li]Rocks turn into “stumps” before returning the ore.[/li]
[li]The higher the level the rock, the longer it takes to restore.[/li]

item.title: [317]100% Mining base for your server![317]
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

Well, i guess ill add the variables for beginners, and thanks Death, i appreciate it
EDIT: Deat, i didnt use that many comventions, because mining would be like, 95%
the other 5% would mot being able to mine runite, coal, or adamant.
i was able to use these conventions though:

} if (Server.Mining.Mining) { Server.Mining.resetMI(this);

Server.Mining.InitiateMI(this, objectID, objectX, objectY); )(only part of a code)

Server.Mining.SpawnRocks(this);

} if (Server.Mining.Mining) { Server.Mining.MIprocess(this);
There are a couple conventions that i was able to use because mining was very messy before i used these. and [ersonally, i love this way of making the mining process. But sadly it might not work on all Deltas

Read full topic
